amendment.description: An amendment numbered 91 printed in the Congressional Record to insert language stating the Secretary submit the developed plans to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Clyde.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
